price: (37) And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wataraknā fīhā āyatan lilladhīna yakhāfūna al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
